Caption: Bliss is dancing to the rhythm of your own heartbeat.

Label: Wellness
Caption: Wellness is the complete integration of body mind and spirit.

Label: Connection
Caption: The best connections are the ones that you didn't see coming.

Label: Resilience
Caption: Life doesn't get easier. You just get stronger.

Label: Strength
Caption: Strength doesn't come from what you can do. It comes from overcoming the things you once thought you couldn't.

Label: Leadership
Caption: A leader is one who knows the way goes the way and shows the way.

Label: Willpower
Caption: Willpower is like a muscle: the more you train it the stronger it gets.

Label: Discipline
Caption: Discipline is choosing between what you want now and what you want most.

Label: Consistency
Caption: Small consistent actions lead to massive results over time.

Label: Confidence
Caption: Confidence is not "they will like me." It's "I'll be fine if they don't."

Label: Purpose
Caption: When you find your purpose you find your life.

Label: Transformation
Caption: Transformation is a process not an event.

Label: Breakthrough
Caption: Sometimes the greatest breakthrough is simply having the courage to begin.

Label: Volcano
Caption: Life is a volcano that erupts thoughts and emotions.

Label: Glacier
Caption: Like a glacier patience levels everything in its path.

Label: Lightning
Caption: Lightning is impressive but it is the thunder that brings the audience to their feet.

Label: Desert
Caption: The desert has its holiness of silence the crowd its holiness of conversation.

Label: Canyon
Caption: Stand at the edge of a canyon to understand the depth of your own soul.

Label: Prairie
Caption: The prairie teaches us that boundaries are simply illusions.

Label: Hill
Caption: From the top of the hill everything seems possible.

Label: Cloud
Caption: Be like a cloud – free-flowing and untethered.

Label: Snow
Caption: Each snowflake is a masterpiece of design and no one design is ever repeated.

Label: Shoreline
Caption: The shoreline is where land and water write poetry together.

Label: Consciousness
Caption: Consciousness is the greatest mystery in the universe.

Label: Identity
Caption: Your identity is not in what you have but in who you are.

Label: Ethics
Caption: Ethics is knowing the difference between what you have a right to do and what is right to do.

Label: Morality
Caption: Morality is the herd-instinct in the individual.

Label: Paradox
Caption: The paradox of life is that often the things we want most are found when we're not looking for them.

Label: Perspective
Caption: Perspective is everything. Change yours and your world changes.

Label: Absurdity
Caption: Life would be tragic if it weren't funny.

Label: Meaning
Caption: Life is not a problem to be solved but a reality to be experienced.

Label: Ego
Caption: The ego is not master in its own house.

Label: Existentialism
Caption: Existence precedes essence.

Label: Metaphor
Caption: Life is a metaphor waiting to be written.

Label: Verse
Caption: There is poetry in the most ordinary moments.

Label: Lyric
Caption: The lyrics of life are written in the small moments of joy.

Label: Rhyme
Caption: Find the rhythm and rhyme in your everyday routine.

Label: Stanza
Caption: Each day is a stanza in the poem of your life.

Label: Sonnet
Caption: Love is like a sonnet – structured yet free.

Label: Haiku
Caption: Simple moments speak volumes like a perfect haiku.

Label: Allegory
Caption: Every life is an allegory waiting to unfold its meaning.

Label: Imagery
Caption: The world is full of magic things patiently waiting for our senses to grow sharper.

Label: Elegy
Caption: An elegy to all the moments we let slip through our fingers.

Label: Hope
Caption: Hope is the thing with feathers that perches in the soul.

Label: Anger
Caption: Anger is just one letter short of danger.

Label: Grief
Caption: Grief is the price we pay for love.

Label: Sympathy
Caption: No one ever told me that grief felt so like fear.

Label: Trust
Caption: Trust takes years to build seconds to break and forever to repair.

Label: Jealousy
Caption: Jealousy is the art of counting someone else's blessings instead of your own.

Label: Affection
Caption: Affection is responsible for nine-tenths of whatever solid and durable happiness there is in our lives.

Label: Sadness
Caption: Sadness gives depth. Happiness gives height. Sadness gives roots. Happiness gives branches.

Label: Desire
Caption: Desire is the key to motivation but it's determination and commitment that unlock the door to success.

Label: Excitement
Caption: Excitement is the electricity of life.

Label: Harmony
Caption: Harmony in the head harmony in the heart harmony in the hands.

Label: Tao
Caption: The Tao that can be told is not the eternal Tao.

Label: Zen
Caption: Zen is not some kind of excitement but concentration on our usual everyday routine.

Label: Karma
Caption: How people treat you is their karma; how you react is yours.

Label: Nirvana
Caption: Nirvana is not a place but a state of consciousness.

Label: Reincarnation
Caption: The soul is eternal and reincarnation is just a change of clothes.

Label: Aura
Caption: Your aura is your spiritual DNA.

Label: Blessing
Caption: Count your blessings not your problems.

Label: Connection
Caption: Everything is connected. The wing of the corn beetle affects the direction of the wind.

Label: Devotion
Caption: Devotion is not a strained obligation but a natural outpouring of love.

Label: Pets
Caption: My pet is not just an animal; it's a small person in a furry suit.

Label: Dating
Caption: Dating me is like… Well I don't know but I'm pretty sure the manual is written in Chinese.

Label: Cooking
Caption: I'm such a good cook that even the smoke alarm cheers me on.

Label: Bills
Caption: My bills are high enough to be in the NBA.

Label: Email
Caption: I have so many unread emails that my computer has started charging me rent.

Label: Work
Caption: I don't always work hard but when I do I make sure everyone on social media knows about it.

Label: School
Caption: School is like a broken pencil... pointless.

Label: Fitness
Caption: My fitness goal is to get up without making sound effects.

Label: Relationships
Caption: Relationships are like algebra. Have you ever looked at your X and wondered Y?

Label: Technology
Caption: I'm not addicted to my phone. I can stop as soon as I finish this level.

Label: Freedom
Caption: Freedom is not given; it is taken.

Label: Morning
Caption: With every rising of the sun think of your life as just begun.

Label: Inspiration
Caption: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.

Label: Comfort
Caption: The greatest comfort is being able to look back and see how far you've come.

Label: Contentment
Caption: True contentment is a pearl of great price.

Label: Enjoyment
Caption: Enjoy the little things for one day you may look back and realize they were the big things.

Label: Pleasure
Caption: The greatest pleasure in life is doing what people say you cannot do.

Label: Connection
Caption: We're all just walking each other home.

Label: Peace
Caption: Peace is not the absence of conflict but the ability to cope with it.

Label: Harmony
Caption: Harmony is pure love for love is complete agreement.

Label: Vision
Caption: Vision without action is merely a dream. Action without vision just passes the time. Vision with action can change the world.

Label: Ambition
Caption: Ambition is the path to success. Persistence is the vehicle you arrive in.
